fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK% |<goblet>  Electro DMG Bonus |<circlet>  CRIT Rate or CRIT DMG

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Lightning Rose
**2)** Elemental Skill: Violet Arc
**3)** Normal Attack: Lightning Touch

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: For a main on-field DPS build, all talents being raised as high as possible is recommended. Thundersoother is only the best if an Electro Aura is continuously maintained. This shouldn't be too difficult in most of Lisa's teams.

footer.text: Character Guide • Build: 丽莎 | Update Date: 07/19/2025 | Editor: ._.samantha._.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK% or Elemental Mastery |<goblet>  Electro Bonus DMG% |<circlet>  CRIT DMG or CRIT Rate

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Lightning Rose
**2)** Elemental Skill: Violet Arc
**3)** Normal Attack: Lightning Touch

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
For a On-field DPS build, all talents being raised as high as possible is recommended. 
__Thundersoother__ is the best if an Electro Aura is continuously maintained. However, being moderately inefficient to farm and losing value on most characters, it is difficult to recommend.
__Gilded Dreams__ is also viable, but comparable or worse to her mentioned alternatives.
